title: Throttle Actuator Motor

body.body: The fixings for the throttle actuator motor and the butterfly hard stop adjustment screws are marked with yellow paint and must not be loosened or removed.
If the throttle actuator motor sensor fixings have been loosened or removed, all warranty claims for the throttle actuator motor will be rejected.
If the fixings or adjustment screws have been loosened or removed the throttle body assembly must be replaced as there are no means to reset the throttle actuator motor to its correct position.
The throttle actuator motor is an integral part of the throttle body and cannot be adjusted or replaced separately.
